verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764>, Altaschith <WH516> <WH8686>, Michtam <WH4387> of David <WH1732>, when he fled <WH1272> <WH8800> from <WH6440> Saul <WH7586> in the cave <WH4631>. Be merciful <WH2603> <WH8798> unto me, O 'Elohim <WH430>, be merciful <WH2603> <WH8798> unto me: for my soul <WH5315> trusteth <WH2620> <WH8804> in thee: yea, in the shadow <WH6738> of thy wings <WH3671> will I make my refuge <WH2620> <WH8799>, until these calamities <WH1942> be overpast <WH5674> <WH8799>.
I will cry <WH7121> <WH8799> unto 'Elohim <WH430> most high <WH5945>; unto 'Elohim <WH410> that performeth <WH1584> <WH8802> all things for me.

He shall send <WH7971> <WH8799> from heaven <WH8064>, and save <WH3467> <WH8686> me from the reproach <WH2778> <WH8765> of him that would swallow me up <WH7602> <WH8802>. Selah <WH5542>. 'Elohim <WH430> shall send forth <WH7971> <WH8799> his mercy <WH2617> and his truth <WH571>.

My soul <WH5315> is among <WH8432> lions <WH3833>: and I lie <WH7901> <WH8799> even among them that are set on fire <WH3857> <WH8802>, even the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120>, whose teeth <WH8127> are spears <WH2595> and arrows <WH2671>, and their tongue <WH3956> a sharp <WH2299> sword <WH2719>.
Be thou exalted <WH7311> <WH8798>, O 'Elohim <WH430>, above the heavens <WH8064>; let thy glory <WH3519> be above all the earth <WH776>.

They have prepared <WH3559> <WH8689> a net <WH7568> for my steps <WH6471>; my soul <WH5315> is bowed down <WH3721> <WH8804>: they have digged <WH3738> <WH8804> a pit <WH7882> before <WH6440> me, into the midst <WH8432> whereof they are fallen <WH5307> <WH8804> themselves. Selah <WH5542>.
My heart <WH3820> is fixed <WH3559> <WH8737>, O 'Elohim <WH430>, my heart <WH3820> is fixed <WH3559> <WH8737>: I will sing <WH7891> <WH8799> and give praise <WH2167> <WH8762>.
Awake up <WH5782> <WH8798>, my glory <WH3519>; awake <WH5782> <WH8798>, psaltery <WH5035> and harp <WH3658>: I myself will awake <WH5782> <WH8686> early <WH7837>.
I will praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee, O YY <WH136>, among the people <WH5971>: I will sing <WH2167> <WH8762> unto thee among the nations <WH3816>.
For thy mercy <WH2617> is great <WH1419> unto the heavens <WH8064>, and thy truth <WH571> unto the clouds <WH7834>.
Be thou exalted <WH7311> <WH8798>, O 'Elohim <WH430>, above the heavens <WH8064>: let thy glory <WH3519> be above all the earth <WH776>.
